example.eg: There was an electrical cord dangling from the wall.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 悬挂, 悬荡, 悬垂

example.eg: The kids dangled their feet over the dock.
example.egtrans: 孩子们坐在码头上，腿悬垂在码头边。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 悬吊, 悬挂, 悬垂

dsense.name: dangle [sth] in front of [sb], dangle [sth] before [sb]

example.eg: Dangle a raise in front of him and see what happens.  The boss dangled extra overtime pay before the employees for working on the holiday.
example.egtrans: 用加薪来吊他的胃口，看看会怎样。为了让雇员节假日上班，老板拿额外加班费来诱惑大家。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拿某物来诱惑某人, 用某物来吊某人的胃口

example.eg: If the killer is caught, he'll dangle.
